body: Hi Ladan, You can use decompose brep component to get the faces and then using list item you can find the bottom plane. To change DIR you can use native grasshopper flip component. I have used the same in the attached file. Since your geometry was not internalized, I used a sample 5m x 5m x 3m box to run the simulation. The file is attached for your reference.
